commentaries.commentary: Player #10 to #7, shot blocked! Crossbar! #31 heads it in! GOAL!
Player #31 and #13 embrace in pure elation, teammates rush in to join the celebration! The stadium erupts, fans cheering wildly! A fantastic display of unity and relief for the goal scorers!
Coaches are gripped! Bayern players celebrating, Fellaini (31) looks dejected. A pivotal moment just happened!
Bayern pushing again! Player #7 unleashes a powerful shot! But the United keeper makes a brilliant diving save, turning it wide!
Replays confirm that incredible save! Player #7's powerful strike was brilliantly denied. A graphic shows Bayern have scored, giving them the lead! Fellaini (31) is clearly frustrated.
What an attack! Player #31 rises above the defense...
